description: Comprehensive S3 monitoring dashboard for GreenLang infrastructure - monitors storage, performance, errors, and costs across all S3 buckets

panels.description: Total storage used across all S3 buckets in the selected environment
panels.title: Total Storage

panels.description: Total number of objects across all S3 buckets
panels.title: Total Objects

panels.description: Number of S3 buckets in the environment
panels.title: Total Buckets

panels.description: Total requests per second across all S3 operations
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: Overall 4xx error rate percentage
panels.title: 4xx Error Rate

panels.description: Overall 5xx error rate percentage
panels.title: 5xx Error Rate

panels.description: Storage distribution across all S3 buckets
panels.title: Storage by Bucket

panels.description: Storage distribution by storage class (STANDARD, STANDARD_IA, GLACIER, etc.)
panels.title: Storage by Storage Class

panels.description: Object count distribution across buckets
panels.title: Object Count by Bucket (Top 10)

panels.description: Storage growth trend over time for all buckets
panels.title: Storage Growth Over Time

panels.description: Object count growth trend over time
panels.title: Object Count Over Time

panels.description: Request rate breakdown by operation type (GET, PUT, DELETE, LIST, HEAD, POST)
panels.title: Request Rate by Operation

panels.description: Request rate per bucket
panels.title: Request Rate by Bucket

panels.description: 4xx client error rate over time

targets.expr: sum by (bucket_name) (rate(aws_s3_4xx_errors{environment="$environment", bucket_name=~"$bucket"}[5m])) / sum by (bucket_name) (rate(aws_s3_all_requests{environment="$environment", bucket_name=~"$bucket"}[5m])) * 100

panels.title: 4xx Error Rate by Bucket

panels.description: 5xx server error rate over time - indicates S3 service issues

targets.expr: sum by (bucket_name) (rate(aws_s3_5xx_errors{environment="$environment", bucket_name=~"$bucket"}[5m])) / sum by (bucket_name) (rate(aws_s3_all_requests{environment="$environment", bucket_name=~"$bucket"}[5m])) * 100

panels.title: 5xx Error Rate by Bucket

panels.description: Error count breakdown by error type
panels.title: Errors by Type

panels.description: S3 throttling events (503 SlowDown errors)
panels.title: Throttling Events

panels.description: First byte latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99) - time to receive first byte of response
panels.title: First Byte Latency (p50, p95, p99)

panels.description: Total request latency percentiles - time from request to complete response
panels.title: Total Request Latency (p50, p95, p99)

panels.description: First byte latency by bucket
panels.title: First Byte Latency p95 by Bucket

panels.description: Latency heatmap showing distribution of request latencies
panels.title: Latency Distribution Heatmap

panels.description: Data transfer rates in and out of S3
panels.title: Data Transfer Rate (In/Out)

panels.description: Data transfer by bucket
panels.title: Data Transfer by Bucket

panels.description: Total data transferred over time range
panels.title: Total Downloaded

panels.description: Total data uploaded over time range
panels.title: Total Uploaded

panels.description: Data transfer by destination type
panels.title: Data Transfer by Type

panels.description: Lifecycle transition counts by storage class
panels.title: Lifecycle Transitions (Daily)

panels.description: Objects expired/deleted by lifecycle rules
panels.title: Lifecycle Expirations (Daily)

panels.description: Replication lag time for cross-region replication
panels.title: Replication Lag

panels.description: Objects pending replication
panels.title: Objects Pending Replication

panels.description: Estimated monthly cost based on current storage and request patterns
panels.title: Estimated Monthly Cost

panels.description: Estimated storage cost (STANDARD: $0.023/GB, IA: $0.0125/GB, GLACIER: $0.004/GB)
panels.title: Storage Cost

panels.description: Estimated request cost based on request patterns
panels.title: Request Cost

panels.description: Estimated data transfer cost
panels.title: Data Transfer Cost

panels.description: Cost trend over time
panels.title: Cost Breakdown Over Time

panels.description: Cost by bucket
panels.title: Cost by Bucket

panels.description: Detailed bucket metrics table
panels.title: Bucket Details

title: S3 Overview Dashboard
